Views¶

Functions listed here are intended to be used as Django views.

gallery.views.gallery_add_media(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Add a media to an existing gallery.models.Gallery.

Creates an instance of gallery.forms.GalleryUpdateForm to get a user’s zip file.

URL: <gallery_root>/add_media

gallery.views.gallery_create(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Create a gallery using standard HTML forms.

Redirects to gallery_edit_details() on creation of a new gallery.

Template Name: gallery/gallery_create.html

Context Variables:

  • gallery_form: A gallery.forms.GalleryDetailsForm that allows a user to define the gallery name, a description of the gallery, and attach a zip archive of photos to associate with gallery.

URL: <gallery_root>/create

gallery.views.gallery_delete(request)¶

Delete a gallery and associated media.

URL: <gallery_root>/delete

gallery.views.gallery_details(request, gallery_id)¶

View a gallery’s details.

Template Name: gallery/gallery_details.html

Context Variables:

  • gallery: The gallery.models.Gallery that will be displayed
  • media: The mimesis.models.MediaUpload objects associated with the gallery.
  • thumbnail_sizes: Dictionary of thumbnail sizes (interface to settings.THUMBNAIL_SIZES)

URL: <gallery_root>/<gallery_id>

gallery.views.gallery_edit_details(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Allows a user to edit details and media tied to an existing gallery.

This view will return a gallery.forms.MediaFormSet that allows users to view the uploaded media, as well as change it’s caption and tags.

Additionally, the user can use this form to delete an image or set it as the gallery’s primary image. This means it will display as the gallery’s thumbnail.

Template Name: gallery/gallery_edit_details.html (gallery/_media_form.html as a subtemplate)

Context Variables:

  • gallery: A gallery.models.Gallery instance that references the photos the user will edit.
  • media_formset: A gallery.forms.MediaFormSet that uses all the media attached to the gallery variable as it’s QuerySet data.
  • thumbnail_sizes: Dictionary of thumbnail sizes (interface to settings.THUMBNAIL_SIZES)

URL: <gallery_root>/edit_details

gallery.views.gallery_image_details(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Returns full details of an image, and the full image for individual viewing.

Template Name: gallery/gallery_image_details.html

Context Variables:

  • media: A mimesis.models.MediaUpload object that is associated with the requested gallery.models.Gallery

URL: <gallery_root>/<gallery_id>/image_details/<image_id>

gallery.views.gallery_list(request)¶

Lists the available galleries.

Template Name: gallery/gallery_list.html

Context Variables:

  • galleries: A QuerySet of gallery.models.Gallery instances.
  • thumbnail_sizes: Dictionary of thumbnail sizes (interface to settings.THUMBNAIL_SIZES)

URL: <gallery_root>/
